prompt:
Patient: I said it's fine. Can we just get through with this conversation?

Nurse: Just give me a second to work out the best way I can assist you. Give me a moment while I figure out how I can best help you.

Nurse: When did you start having bloody stool, Mr. Amador?

Patient: You already know that I have that.

Patient: Whole reason why I'm getting the code off

Patient: p.

Nurse: I understand, Mr. Amador. I need to ask these questions for our records. Does the blood in your stool appear to be bright red, or is it more of a dark, tarry color?

Patient: I don't know.

responses.gpt4: I understand, Mr. Amador. It's important to note these details as it can help us determine the possible source of bleeding. Have you noticed any other symptoms ��� such as pain, changes in bowel habits, weight loss, or fatigue?
responses.our_model: That's okay, Mr. Amador. Do you experience any abdominal pain along with the bloody stool?
